title: Online Language Course Design Utilizing IMS Learning Design Standards

context.prior_knowledge: Basic e-learning management experience and digital learning tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Enhancing competencies in applying standard models for systematically designing language education programs for corporate administrators/leaders

learning_goals: Learners can explain core components of IMS Learning Design standards and apply them to actual educational scenarios
Learners can design standards-based learning activities and integrate them into language curricula
Learners can establish visualization and evaluation plans for learning flows using IMS LD in LMS environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
